data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Heleodoro, Raphael Aquino, Rafael, José Albertino (2018): Description of a new species of Isagoras Stål (Phasmatodea: Pseudophasmatidae: Xerosomatinae: Prexaspini) from the State of Minas Gerais, Brazil. Zootaxa 4378 (4): 595-600, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4378.4.11|3 occurrences
